preference.name: CPD_execute_relation_save_post_action
preference.preference_description: Activates relation save post action that updates the Positioned Geometry for a Design Component object whenever a dataset of type UGMASTER, UGALTREP, DirectModel is attached (with either IMAN_specification or IMAN_rendering relation) to an Item Revision that is referenced by that Design Component. The update action may modify one or more of the following depending on the information available from the dataset being attached on the Item Revision: * bounding box coordinates * Trueshape Data * Direct Model Data The default value is false, which disables the above action if only appmodel is installed. Note: This preference is needed even when the "CPD_execute_dataset_save_post_action" preference is set to true. This is because the Dataset attached to an Item Revision might be preexisting, and hence the Dataset save post-action will not update the Positioned Geometry in case of a "Cut and Paste" action.
